data.title: Wife Shraddha Nigam Reacts On Karan Singh Grover's Marriage With Bipasha Basu
data.meta_description: Karan Singh Grover's ex-wife Shraddha Nigam opened up about Karan's wedding with Bipasha Basu.
data.text:
[tps_footer]Bollywood’s hottest couple Karan Singh Grover and Bipasha Basu finally married on April 30 at a Suburban Hotel in Mumbai followed with a star-studded reception in the evening. Bollywood biggies Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Salman Khan, Abhishek Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Sonam Kapoor, Sushmita Sen, Preity Zinta and many others from B-town arrived at the wedding reception to bless the lovely couple.

CLICK HERE FOR ALL BOX OFFICE UPDATES

The two who fell in love with each other on the sets of their film ‘Alone’, in 2015, danced the night away on the floor like never before. This is Bipasha‘s first marriage while Karan has married twice before with Shraddha Nigam for 10 months and then to Jennifer Winget for almost 2 years.

Recently, Karan Singh Grover‘s ex-wife Shraddha Nigam, who is now happily married to TV actor Mayank Anand, opened up about ex-husband’s marriage with Bipasha Basu. In an interview, Shraddha wished all the luck for his wedding and a good life ahead.

Well, days before, KSG‘s second ex-wife Jennifer Winget also opened up about her divorce and marriage like never before but she even made it clear that now she is happy in her space. On her marriage with KSG, Jennifer revealed that it was a roller coaster experience as there were some sad and happy moments. She also said that she don’t regret a single day of her life and that s**t happens. But she holds no grudges and is happy in her space.

CLICK HERE FOR ALL LATEST BOLLYWOOD UPDATES

All we can say is ‘All’s Well That Ends Well’ with everyone’s lives moved on![/tps_footer]
